distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for bash fixes the following issues:
	  
Security issue fixed: 

- CVE-2019-9924: Fixed a vulnerability in which shell did not prevent user BASH_CMDS 
  allowing the user to execute any command with the permissions of the shell (bsc#1130324).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: rbash in Bash before 4.4-beta2 did not prevent the shell user from modifying BASH_CMDS, thus allowing the user to execute any command with the permissions of the shell.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
